overview: Best supporting actor Scott Baldwin and big dicked Drew Andrews star in this bold and sensual story of a young man's struggle between love for his church and his sexual desires and insatiable lust of the flesh. Winner of two 1996 Gay Erotic Video Awards; Best Supporting Actor (Scott Baldwin) and Best Non-Sexual Role (Jeanna Fine).
tagline: Forgive Me Father For I Have Sinned
title: Our Trespasses
